item.title: How to Hugo

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m AudryğŸ‘‹ Here’s a little bit about me: ğŸ’» I’m a software engineer at Ookla, where I help build products that turn billions of real-time data points into global network intelligence and insights. ğŸ§ I created FÃ¡na, an open-source feature flagging platform specializing in audience-targeting to help developers test new features in production. ğŸŒ± I’m always on the lookout for ways that I can create new things and have fun while doing it ğŸ“ˆ Formerly a data management consultant helping clients manage their regulatory data & modernize their legal operations.
